content:
Wow that's so great. Then, please describe it in Chapter a, Post Object Type, of Chapter 2 Body. Through various examples and metaphors, we ask that novice WordPress developers understand it easily.
Body
a. Post Object Type
i. Explain the purpose of the post object type
ii. Discuss how custom post types can be used to create unique content types
iii. Provide examples of custom post types (e.g., portfolio, event, product, etc.)
iv. Explain the role of post metadata and how it can be used to store additional information about a post
Answer in English.지금 번역하기
